arr = ds.query_index_member(index='000300.SH', start_date=20160101,
    end_date=20170505)
symbol_arr = ','.join(arr)
df, msg = ds.query_dividend(symbol_arr, start_date=20160101, end_date=20170101)
df2 = df.pivot(index='exdiv_date', columns='symbol', values='share_ratio')
assert abs(df.loc[(df['exdiv_date'] == 20160504) & (df['symbol'] ==
    '002085.SZ'), 'share_ratio'] - 0.2).iat[0] < 0.01
